title: Correction: Effects of the DailyColors™ polyphenol supplement on serum proteome, cognitive function, and health in older adults at risk of cognitive and functional decline.
abstract: Correction for 'Effects of the DailyColors™ polyphenol supplement on serum proteome, cognitive function, and health in older adults at risk of cognitive and functional decline' by Mary O'Learyet al.,Food Funct., 2025,16, 4505-4520, https://doi.org/10.1039/d4fo06259k.
